question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Autism Awareness Day (WAAD)?
option1: Autism and the 2030 Agenda: Inclusion and Neuro diversity
option4: Sustainable Development: The Promise of Technology
explanation: The World Autism Awareness Day (AWWD) is an internationally recognised day observed every year on April 2 to highlight the need to help improve the quality of life of those with autism so they can lead full and meaningful lives as an integral part of society. The 2017 theme is “Toward Autonomy and Self-Determination”.
